      Methods in com.im.njams.sdk.utils that return ReflectionWrapper.ArgsBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ReflectionWrapper.ArgsBuilder ReflectionWrapper.ArgsBuilder.addNull​(Class<?> type)
      Adds null to the argument list.
      ReflectionWrapper.ArgsBuilder ReflectionWrapper.ArgsBuilder.addObject​(Object obj)
      Adds a (non-primitive) object to the argument list.
      <T> ReflectionWrapper.ArgsBuilder ReflectionWrapper.ArgsBuilder.addObject​(T obj, Class<? super T> asType)
      Adds a (non-primitive) object to the argument list.
      ReflectionWrapper.ArgsBuilder ReflectionWrapper.ArgsBuilder.addPrimitive​(Object obj)
      Adds a primitive value to the argument list.
      static ReflectionWrapper.ArgsBuilder ReflectionWrapper.argsBuilder()
      Returns a new ReflectionWrapper.ArgsBuilder instance for building an argument list.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Object ReflectionWrapper.invoke​(String method, ReflectionWrapper.ArgsBuilder callArgs)
      Invokes a method on this instance's target object and returns its value, if any.
      Constructors in com.im.njams.sdk.utils with parameters of type ReflectionWrapper.ArgsBuilder 
      Constructor Description
      ReflectionWrapper​(String className, ReflectionWrapper.ArgsBuilder constructorArgs)
      Same as ReflectionWrapper(String, ClassLoader, ArgsBuilder) using the current context classloader.
